messages.message:
Forgive me if this is not the right channel for this. I created an app that processes Invoices and Receipts from Brazil. It works very well, and I'd like to send its link to some clients, so they can try it with their own AI Hub accounts. Is that possible?
The app may be visible to Instabase only. Thank you.
https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/5d40cf71-2ed8-4d96-8f6b-158a15511b34
you should be able to share an app by following these instructions https://aihub.instabase.com/docs/aihub/apps/index.html#sharing-apps
(<#C05BJCNKZAM|> would be better in the future i think)
cc: @avi. We might even be able to publish this as an IB app

One issue, I believe is that I created the app with our commercial account, so it will be accessible only to our organization. Is there a way to make some backup of it, to port it to the Community version, where everyone could access it?

There currently isn't an easy way to port an app across accounts. I'm also not sure that making this a public app is a good idea since we'll want to test the accuracy and will then need to maintain it moving forward. @andy it may be interesting to consider a feature where our sales teams can publish an app as unlisted publicly from their commercial accounts in the future. Or can easily port ai hub apps across accounts/envs. We want to build this anyways for environment portability.

@fernando.piazza.ctr I know this isn't ideal, but for now would it be possible to recreate the app in your community account? Hoping that it may be easy for a small amount of fields
